#summary Build instructions for building gwt-mosaic.jar and running the demo.

=== Requirements ===

 * GWT 1.5.3 is required.
 * The build requires a *GWT_HOME* enviornment variable
 * Eclipse requires a *GWT15_HOME* classpath variable

===1. Building===
----
To build a JAR enter:
{{{
	ant
}}}	
_Note: please check the build.properties and choose the correct value for the
'gwt.dev' variable (default is 'gwt-dev-linux')._

Other ANT targets are:
 * all - for building the JAR and the demo WAR
 * jar - for building the JAR only (default)
 * war - for building the WAR

=== 2. The demo ===
----
To compile and run the demo enter:
{{{
	Mosaic-compile
	Mosaic-shell
}}}
_Note: both scripts are for linux._

===3. Using===
----
To use the library you will need also gwt-dnd.jar & gwt-incubator.jar 
from the lib directory and you have to add:
{{{
	<inherits name='org.gwt.mosaic.Mosaic' />
	<inherits name='org.gwt.mosaic.actions.Actions' />

	<stylesheet src="gwt/standard/Mosaic.css" />
}}}
in your module gwt.xml file.
